Schedule

This page contains an outline of the topics, content, and assignments for the semester. Note that this schedule will be updated as the semester progresses, with all changes documented here.

Weekly schedule

Week Dates Topic Assignments
Week 01 Aug 29 - Sep 02 Welcome to Regression Analysis Compelete STA 210 Student Survey
Week 02 Sep 05 - 09 SLR: Tidymodels + Model evaluation Lab 01, Statistics experience assigned
Week 03 Sep 12 - 16 SLR: Inference Lab 02, HW 01, Statistics experience assigned
Week 04 Sep 19 - 23 Multiple Linear Regression (MLR) Lab 03
Week 05 Sep 26 - 30 MLR: Types of Predictors Exam 01
Week 06 Oct 03 - 07 Feature Engineering Lab 04, HW 02
Week 07 Oct 10 - 14 Variable transformations Introduce project
Week 08 Oct 17 - 21 Model evaluation Lab 05
Week 09 Oct 24 - 28 MLR: Inference Lab 06, HW 03
Week 10 Oct 31 - Nov 04 Odds + Odds Ratios Lab 07
Week 11 Nov 07 - 11 Logistic regression (LR) Project peer review, HW 04
Week 12 Nov 14 - 18 LR: Inference Lab 08
Week 13 Nov 21 - 25 Mixed effects models
Week 14 Nov 28 - Dec 02 Mixed effects models Exam 02
Week 15 Dec 05 - 09 Looking ahead Statistics experience due
Week 16 Dec 12 - 19 Final exam period
No matching items

Notes

  • Homework will be due on Wednesdays at 11:59pm. You will have one week to complete each homework assignment.

  • Lab:

    • Lab sections 01 & 02 (Thursdays): Labs will be due on Mondays at 11:59pm.
    • Lab sections 03 & 04 (Fridays): Labs will be due on Tuesdays at 11:59pm.

  • Project dates will be added when the project is assigned.
